explains: adj. 凯尔特人的，凯尔特语的

sentences.en: The Dutch team romped to a 5–1 victory over Celtic.
sentences.cn: 荷兰队以5：1轻松战胜了凯尔特队。

sentences.en: He was the one who first set down the stories of the Celtic storytellers.
sentences.cn: 他是第一个将凯尔特说书人讲的故事记载下来的人。

sentences.en: He recognized that Sanskrit, the language of India, was related very closely to Latin, Greek, and the Germanic and Celtic languages.
sentences.cn: 他认识到梵语，即印度的语言，与拉丁语、希腊语、日尔曼语和凯尔特语密切同源。
